title: Adobe CJM ExperienceEvent - Tracking link details
description: Describes fields associated with the tracking link through which interaction is made by the end user.

xdm:interactionType.title: Interaction Type
xdm:interactionType.description: Specify action made by user on a message.

meta:enum.open: Link in a message is clicked by the user.

xdm:description.title: Tracking URL Description
xdm:description.description: A human-friendly description of the link.

xdm:label.title: URL Label
xdm:label.description: The user-friendly label clicking on which the link opens.

xdm:category.title: URL Category
xdm:category.description: The category of the link. It may be `subscription`, or a user-defined category.
